web.body:
This is the Release Version


  • no updates made

desktop.body:
In this Version, Settings finaly got added! Beside that we startet working on multi platform and made a few UI Changes

  • Added Settings
  • Small changes on Splashscreen
  • Changed Storage Handling to support multi Platform (WIP)

In this Version, Settings finaly got added! Beside that we startet working on multi platform and made a few UI Changes

  • Fixed Settings Issue (it now generates the Config)
  • Fixed Settings beein cleared
  • Added Version to Settings Screen
  • Fixed Update Button
  • Fixed Status buttons (minimize,maximize,close)
  • Due to these Bugs The Path Setting was disabled until the next patch
